content: Adjunct Faculty – University Of Oregon for Architecture & Historic Preservation 1996 to Present, School of Architecture and Allied Arts. Eugene and Portland, Oregon. 1997 to Present
Adjunct Faculty - Southern Oregon University, Elderhostel’s Road Scholar Program, Pacific Northwest Lodges and Landscapes, Ashland/Portland, 2003 - 2007
Washington State Parks, Fort Worden Preservation Training Program, Adjunct Instructor for documentation and recordation standards, HABS/HAER. 2000 to 2003, Fort Worden, Port Townsend, Washington
National Register Programs, Section 106 & 110, A Workshop on the new Federal Regulations 36 CFR Part 800. University of Oregon, Eugene, Oregon

Pacific Northwest Preservation Field School – University of Oregon, Oregon / Washington / Idaho & California State Parks and Recreation / SHPO, National Park Service. Founding member, Program Coordination and Faculty, 1995 to 2003 and 2012.
Northwest Youth Corps - Founding Coordinator and Program Development for Historic & Rustic Construction Program
